name: 32D
description:
You are working at a laptop repair shop and you have to fix the costumers laptops, but not ordinarily. You have to fix them with minigames in what you have to destroy viruses or find a way thru them!

=======

Programming: Newokmyne, Préda
3D modeling: Préda
2D graphics: Hindbodes
Music: Brodux (@broduxofficial)
